# Move final data to app folder

```{r}
file.copy(
  list.files(
    here(
      "..",
      "data",
      "final"
    ),
    full.names = TRUE
  ),
  here(
    "..",
    "app",
    "data"
  ),
  recursive = TRUE
)

file.copy(
  "vars-control.R",
  here(
    "..",
    "app",
    "auxiliary"
  )
)
```
